item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260127)
item.description:
What's New

Fix backspace restore and Vietnamese processing after undo

Changes:

  • VNEngine: Reset tempDisableKey on backspace to allow tone marks after undo
  • XKeyIMController: Improve backspace restore for Input Method mode

- Track cursor position for proper word restoration

- Delete trailing space and re-mark text when restoring

- Use resetWithCursorMoved on app switch

  • AppBehaviorDetector: Add new behavior detection rules
  • CharacterInjector: Update injection logic

Tests:

  • Add unit tests for undo+backspace+retype scenarios (tone marks and DD)
  • Verify tempDisableKey reset works correctly
